string.text:
A variant of the popular Saiga12 semiautomatic shotgun introduced by Duty to provide their elite squads with access to modern sight systems as well as a more ergonomical shotgun platform. A higher capacity magazine is also included. The weapon has both a dovetail mount and a picatinny bar for use with various types of sights.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]Attachments: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: aimpoint, d0cter, rmr, ac10632, c-more, aim_low 
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: NATO supressor
